1343760.name: Fantasy Grounds - Mini-Dungeon Monthly #10
1343760.description:
Mini-Dungeon Monthly #10


Mini-Dungeon Monthly is the official monthly RPG zine by AAW Games!
Each issue features five brand-new Mini-Dungeon adventures that are 5th edition compatible.
Check out
Mini-Dungeon Monthly on Fantasy Grounds and Steam as well!
Five adventures included!
Terror in the Terraduct! An adventure for four to six characters of 2nd-3rd level by Owen K.C. Stephens
Beware What You Wish For An easy adventure for four to five characters of 3rd-4th level by Stephen Yeardley
The Bells of Stonespire An adventure for three to four characters of 8th-10th level by Justin Andrew Mason
For the Fallen One A fantasy funeral service for four to six characters of any level by Thilo Graf
Paints of the Gods A godlike artifact and creative experience for any number of characters of any level by Jonathan G. Nelson
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Aaron Gentry
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
